HTTPIf you now issue another GET request on the indexer, the response from the service willinclude an ID property in the cache object. The alphanumeric string is appended to thename of the container containing all the cached results and intermediate state of eachdocument processed by this indexer. The ID will be used to uniquely name the cache inBlob storage. HTTPTo run indexer, you can use the portal or the API. In the portal, from the indexers list,select the indexer and click Run. One advantage to using the portal is that you canmonitor indexer status, note the duration of the job, and how many documents areprocessed. Portal pages are refreshed every few minutes.
